sentence.Network_en: She saw herself as a direct, no-nonsense modern woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 她认为自己是个直截了当、不拖泥带水的现代女性。

sentence.Network_en: You'll need no-nonsense boots for the jungle.
sentence.Network_cn: 你需要一双实用的靴子穿越丛林。

sentence.Network_en: She had been so simply taught that there was no nonsense in her head.
sentence.Network_cn: 她受的教育极单纯,脑子里毫无邪念.

the no-nonsense tones of a stern parent ; plain , no-nonsense meals at a diner .一位严厉的父母严肃的口气；宴会上简单、实用的饭菜

entry.tran: 讲究实际的;直截了当的;不容胡闹的
entry.def: If you describe someone as a no-nonsense person, you approve of the fact that they are efficient, direct, and quite tough.

example.ex: She saw herself as a direct, no-nonsense modern woman.
example.tran: 她认为自己是个直截了当、不拖泥带水的现代女性。

entry.def: If you describe something as a no-nonsense thing, you approve of the fact that it is plain and does not have unnecessary parts.

example.ex: You'll need no-nonsense boots for the jungle.
example.tran: 你需要一双实用的靴子穿越丛林。

sentences.sentence: "the no-nonsense tones of a stern parent"
